TITLE: Defining Exam Structure with HTML and Markdown for R/exams
DESCRIPTION: A template structure for exam documents in the R/exams package. The template includes HTML comments for metadata (exam ID and date) and markdown-style placeholders for question headers, questions, solutions, and list items that will be populated when generating an actual exam.
SOURCE: https://github.com/cran/exams.git/blob/master/inst/pandoc/plain.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<!-- Exam ##ID## -->
<!-- ##Date## -->

#-
  *
#-
  ##Questionheader##
  ==================
#-
  ##Question##
#-
    * ##Questionlist##
#-
  ##Solutionheader##
  ==================
#-
  ##Solution##
#-
    * ##Solutionlist##
#-

#-

```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Function Arguments in exams2qti21
DESCRIPTION: Code reference showing new and modified arguments for the exams2qti21 function, including navigation, selection, and display options.
SOURCE: https://github.com/cran/exams.git/blob/master/NEWS.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: R
CODE:
```
"navigation = \"nonlinear\""
"selection = \"pool\""
"shufflesections = FALSE"
"cloze_schoice_display = \"auto\""
"allowskipping = TRUE"
"allowreview = FALSE"
"allowcomment = FALSE"
"casesensitive = TRUE"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuration Options for OpenOlat
DESCRIPTION: Example of configuration options for OpenOlat assessments using the config parameter in exams2openolat function.
SOURCE: https://github.com/cran/exams.git/blob/master/NEWS.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: R
CODE:
```
"config = list(cancel = TRUE, scoreprogress = TRUE)"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring PDF LaTeX Highlight Example
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to use exams2pdf with highlighted R code chunks by setting highlight option and specifying a custom template.
SOURCE: https://github.com/cran/exams.git/blob/master/NEWS.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: R
CODE:
```
exams2pdf("lm.Rmd", highlight = TRUE, template = "plain-highlight")
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: R Code Chunk Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Example of R markdown code chunk configuration specifying highlight option.
SOURCE: https://github.com/cran/exams.git/blob/master/NEWS.md#2025-04-21_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: R
CODE:
```
{r, highlight=TRUE}
```

TITLE: LaTeX URL Formatting
DESCRIPTION: LaTeX code showing URL formatting replacement pattern using href and texttt commands.
SOURCE: https://github.com/cran/exams.git/blob/master/NEWS.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: LaTeX
CODE:
```
\url{...} -> \href{...}{\texttt{...}}
```
